name: tiddlymemo
description: TiddlyMemo uses advanced Incremental Learning concepts to make it your powerful second brain for acquiring lifelong knowledge.

scripts.serve-manual: cross-env TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH=./plugins TIDDLYWIKI_THEME_PATH='./themes' TIDDLYWIKI_LANGUAGE_PATH='./languages' npx nodemon -e tid,multids,js,info --watch plugins ./node_modules/tiddlywiki/tiddlywiki.js editions/manual/index --listen
scripts.serve-manual-zh-Hans: cross-env TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH=./plugins TIDDLYWIKI_THEME_PATH='./themes' TIDDLYWIKI_LANGUAGE_PATH='./languages' npx nodemon -e tid,multids,js,info --watch plugins ./node_modules/tiddlywiki/tiddlywiki.js  editions/manual/zh-Hans --listen
scripts.serve-empty: cross-env TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH=./plugins TIDDLYWIKI_THEME_PATH='./themes' TIDDLYWIKI_LANGUAGE_PATH='./languages' npx nodemon -e tid,multids,js,info --watch plugins ./node_modules/tiddlywiki/tiddlywiki.js  editions/empty/index --listen
scripts.serve-empty-zh-Hans: cross-env TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH=./plugins TIDDLYWIKI_THEME_PATH='./themes' TIDDLYWIKI_LANGUAGE_PATH='./languages' npx nodemon -e tid,multids,js,info --watch plugins ./node_modules/tiddlywiki/tiddlywiki.js  editions/empty/zh-Hans --listen
scripts.serve-website: cross-env TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH=./plugins TIDDLYWIKI_THEME_PATH='./themes' TIDDLYWIKI_LANGUAGE_PATH='./languages' npx tiddlywiki editions/website/index --listen
scripts.serve-website-zh-Hans: cross-env TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH=./plugins TIDDLYWIKI_THEME_PATH='./themes' TIDDLYWIKI_LANGUAGE_PATH='./languages' npx tiddlywiki editions/website/zh-Hans --listen
scripts.serve-full: cross-env TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH=./plugins TIDDLYWIKI_THEME_PATH='./themes' TIDDLYWIKI_LANGUAGE_PATH='./languages' npx nodemon -e tid,multids,js,info --watch plugins ./node_modules/tiddlywiki/tiddlywiki.js editions/full --listen
scripts.build-manual: cross-env TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH=./plugins TIDDLYWIKI_THEME_PATH='./themes' TIDDLYWIKI_LANGUAGE_PATH='./languages' npx tiddlywiki editions/manual/index --output docs/manual/ --build index
scripts.build-manual-zh-Hans: cross-env TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH=./plugins TIDDLYWIKI_THEME_PATH='./themes' TIDDLYWIKI_LANGUAGE_PATH='./languages' npx tiddlywiki editions/manual/zh-Hans --output docs/manual/ --build index
scripts.build-manual-all: npm run build-manual && npm run build-manual-zh-Hans
scripts.build-empty: cross-env TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH=./plugins TIDDLYWIKI_THEME_PATH='./themes' TIDDLYWIKI_LANGUAGE_PATH='./languages' npx tiddlywiki editions/empty/index --output docs/empty/ --build index
scripts.build-empty-zh-Hans: cross-env TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH=./plugins TIDDLYWIKI_THEME_PATH='./themes' TIDDLYWIKI_LANGUAGE_PATH='./languages' npx tiddlywiki editions/empty/zh-Hans --output docs/empty/ --build index
scripts.build-empty-all: npm run build-empty && npm run build-empty-zh-Hans
scripts.build-website: cross-env TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH=./plugins TIDDLYWIKI_THEME_PATH='./themes' TIDDLYWIKI_LANGUAGE_PATH='./languages' npx tiddlywiki editions/website/index --output docs/ --build index
scripts.build-website-zh-Hans: cross-env TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH=./plugins TIDDLYWIKI_THEME_PATH='./themes' TIDDLYWIKI_LANGUAGE_PATH='./languages' npx tiddlywiki editions/website/zh-Hans --output docs/ --build index
scripts.build-website-all: npm run build-website && npm run build-website-zh-Hans
scripts.build-full: cross-env TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH=./plugins TIDDLYWIKI_THEME_PATH='./themes' TIDDLYWIKI_LANGUAGE_PATH='./languages' npx tiddlywiki editions/full --output docs/ --build index
scripts.build-edition-all: npm run build-manual-all && npm run build-empty-all && npm run build-website-all && npm run build-full
scripts.build-library: cross-env TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH='./plugins' TIDDLYWIKI_THEME_PATH='./themes' TIDDLYWIKI_LANGUAGE_PATH='./languages' npx tiddlywiki editions/full --output docs/library --build library
scripts.build-all: npm run build-edition-all && npm run build-library

author: oflg
